sentences.zh: 太史公讀秦記，至犬戎敗幽王，周東徙洛邑，秦襄公始封為諸侯，作西畤用事上帝，僭端見矣。

translations.text: When Sima Qian read the Qin records, reaching the point where the Quanrong defeated King You and Zhou moved east to Luoyi, Qin Duke Xiang was first enfeoffed as a feudal lord, establishing the Western Altar to serve the Supreme Deity, the signs of presumption were already apparent.

sentences.zh: 《禮》曰：「天子祭天地，諸侯祭其域內名山大川。」

translations.text: The Rites say: 'The Son of Heaven sacrifices to Heaven and Earth; feudal lords sacrifice to the famous mountains and great rivers within their domains.'

sentences.zh: 今秦雜戎翟之俗，先暴戾，後仁義，位在藩臣而臚於郊祀，君子懼焉。

translations.text: Now Qin mixed the customs of the Rong and Di barbarians, first tyrannical and cruel, later benevolent and righteous. Though positioned as a vassal minister, they arrogated the suburban sacrifices. Gentlemen fear this.

sentences.zh: 及文公踰隴，攘夷狄，尊陳寶，營岐雍之閒，而穆公修政，東竟至河，則與齊桓、晉文中國侯伯侔矣。

translations.text: When Duke Wen crossed the Long mountains, drove out the Yi and Di barbarians, honored Chen Bao, and built fortifications between Qi and Yong, Duke Mu implemented good government, and his eastern border reached the Yellow River. He was then equal to Duke Huan of Qi and Duke Wen of Jin, the lords and hegemons of China.

sentences.zh: 是後陪臣執政，大夫世祿，六卿擅晉權，征伐會盟，威重於諸侯。

translations.text: After this, subordinate ministers took power, grand masters held hereditary stipends, the six ministers monopolized Jin's authority, conducting campaigns and alliances, their might heavier than the feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 及田常殺簡公而相齊國，諸侯晏然弗討，海內爭於戰功矣。

translations.text: When Tian Chang killed Duke Jian and became chancellor of Qi, the feudal lords calmly did not punish him. Within the seas, they contended over military achievements.

sentences.zh: 三國終之卒分晉，田和亦滅齊而有之，六國之盛自此始。

translations.text: The three families finally divided Jin, and Tian He also extinguished Qi and possessed it. The flourishing of the six states began from this.

sentences.zh: 務在彊兵并敵，謀詐用而從衡短長之說起。

translations.text: They devoted themselves to strengthening armies and annexing enemies. Plots and deceit were employed, and the theories of horizontal and vertical alliances arose.

sentences.zh: 矯稱蜂出，誓盟不信，雖置質剖符猶不能約束也。

translations.text: They falsely claimed to swarm out like bees, their sworn alliances were untrustworthy. Even placing hostages and splitting tallies could not bind them.

sentences.zh: 秦始小國僻遠，諸夏賓之，比於戎翟，至獻公之後常雄諸侯。

translations.text: Qin began as a small country in a remote place, the various Xia treated it as a guest, comparing it to the Rong and Di, but after Duke Xian it constantly dominated the feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 論秦之德義不如魯衛之暴戾者，量秦之兵不如三晉之彊也，然卒并天下，非必險固便形勢利也，蓋若天所助焉。

translations.text: If we discuss Qin's virtue and righteousness, it was not as good as the tyranny of Lu and Wei; if we measure Qin's troops, they were not as strong as the three Jin states. Yet it finally united the world. This was not necessarily because of dangerous terrain and advantageous positions, but rather as if Heaven assisted it.

sentences.zh: 或曰「東方物所始生，西方物之成孰」。

translations.text: Some say: 'Eastern things are where all things begin to be born; western things are where all things reach maturity.'

sentences.zh: 夫作事者必於東南，收功實者常於西北。

translations.text: Those who undertake affairs must do so in the southeast; those who reap actual achievements are constantly in the northwest.

sentences.zh: 故禹興於西羌，湯起於亳，周之王也以豐鎬伐殷，秦之帝用雍州興，漢之興自蜀漢。

translations.text: Therefore Yu arose from the western Qiang, Tang rose from Bo, King Zhou used Feng and Hao to attack Yin, Qin used Yong province to rise to imperial power, and Han arose from Shu and Han.

sentences.zh: 秦既得意，燒天下詩書，諸侯史記尤甚，為其有所刺譏也。

translations.text: After Qin achieved its ambitions, it burned the world's poetry and books. The records of the feudal lords were especially severe, because they contained criticisms.

sentences.zh: 詩書所以復見者，多藏人家，而史記獨藏周室，以故滅。

translations.text: The reason poetry and books reappeared was that they were extensively stored in people's homes, but the historical records were uniquely stored in the Zhou court, so they were extinguished.

sentences.zh: 惜哉，惜哉！

translations.text: What a pity, what a pity!

sentences.zh: 獨有秦記，又不載日月，其文略不具。

translations.text: Only the Qin records remained, but they did not record dates and months, their text was brief and incomplete.

sentences.zh: 然戰國之權變亦有可頗采者，何必上古。

translations.text: However, the stratagems and changes of the Warring States also have much that is worthy of selection. Why must it be ancient times?

sentences.zh: 秦取天下多暴，然世異變，成功大。

translations.text: Qin took the world with much tyranny, yet eras change and transform, and great success was achieved.

sentences.zh: 傳曰「法後王」，何也？

translations.text: The tradition says 'follow later kings.' Why is this?

sentences.zh: 以其近己而俗變相類，議卑而易行也。

translations.text: Because they are close to us, and customs and changes are similar, the discussions are lowly and easy to carry out.

sentences.zh: 學者牽於所聞，見秦在帝位日淺，不察其終始，因舉而笑之，不敢道，此與以耳食無異。

translations.text: Scholars are constrained by what they have heard. Seeing that Qin's time on the imperial throne was brief, they do not examine its beginning and end, and thus laugh at it dismissively, not daring to discuss it. This is no different from accepting hearsay without verification.

sentences.zh: 悲夫！

translations.text: How lamentable!

sentences.zh: 余於是因秦記，踵春秋之後，起周元王，表六國時事，訖二世，凡二百七十年，著諸所聞興壞之端。

translations.text: Therefore I have followed the Qin records, continued after the Spring and Autumn Annals, beginning from King Yuan of Zhou, tabulating the events of the six states period, ending with the Second Emperor, altogether 270 years, recording the trends of rise and fall that I have heard about.

sentences.zh: 後有君子，以覽觀焉。

translations.text: Later gentlemen may peruse and observe them.

sentences.zh: 公元前

translations.text: BCE
translations.footnote: Translator's note: This column does not appear in Sima Qian's original text. It is added here for convenience.

sentences.zh: 周

translations.text: Zhou

sentences.zh: 秦

translations.text: Qin

sentences.zh: 魏

translations.text: Wei

sentences.zh: 韓

translations.text: Han

sentences.zh: 趙

translations.text: Zhao

sentences.zh: 楚

translations.text: Chu

sentences.zh: 燕

translations.text: Yan

sentences.zh: 齊

translations.text: Qi

cells.translation: Xianzi. First year of Duke Chu's successor.
Thirteenth year of King Hui Zhang. Wu attacks us.
2nd year. Shu people came to offer tribute.
14th year: Yue besieged Wu; Wu resented this.
Ninth year: Jin Zhi Bo Yao came to attack us
6th year. Yiqu came to offer tribute. Mian Zhu sought aid
18th year. Cai Sheng Hou, first year

cells.content: 衛出公飲，大夫不解襪，公怒，即攻公，公奔宋。
cells.translation: Wei Chu Gong drank, the grand officers did not remove their socks, the duke was angry, attacked the grand officers, they fled to Song.
19th year. Prince Zi Ying fled to Qin.

cells.content: 十。庶長將兵拔魏城。彗星見。
cells.translation: Tenth year: Shu Zhang led troops and captured Wei's city. Comet appeared.
Twenty-second year: Lu Ai Gong died.

cells.content: 二十三。魯悼公元年。三桓勝，魯如小侯。
cells.translation: 23rd year. Lu Dao Gong, first year. The Three Huan were victorious, Lu became like a small marquis.

cells.content: 知伯伐鄭，駟桓子如齊求救。
cells.translation: Thirty-fourth year: King Xiang of Chu toured the Yellow River.

cells.content: 五十四。知伯謂簡子，欲廢太子襄子，襄子怨知伯。
cells.translation: 54th year. Zhi Bo told Jian Zi that he wanted to depose the crown prince Xiang Zi, Xiang Zi resented Zhi Bo.

cells.content: 十七。救鄭，晉師去。中行文子謂田常：「乃今知所以亡。」
cells.translation: Seventeenth year: Saved Zheng; the Jin army departed. Zhonghang Wen Zi said to Tian Chang: "Now I know the reason for Jin's defeat."

cells.content: 十六。塹阿旁。伐大荔。補龐戲城。
cells.translation: 16th year. Dug trenches around the slopes. Attacked Dali. Repaired Pangxi city.
20th year. The duke led troops to battle Mian Zhu.

cells.content: 襄子。元年未除服，登夏屋，誘代王，以金斗殺代王。封伯魯子周為代成君。
cells.translation: Xiang Zi. First year, mourning not yet ended, ascended the Xia Wu building, lured the King of Dai, and killed him with a gold ladle. Enfeoffed Bo Lu Zi Zhou as Lord of Dai Cheng.
32nd year. Cai Sheng Hou passed away.
Jin Ai Gong Ji, first year.
33rd year. Cai Yuan Hou, first year.
Wei Dao Gong Qian, first year.
Qi Xuan Gong Jiu Za, first year.
4th year. Divided Fan and Zhonghang territory with Zhi Bo.
Wei Huan Zi defeated Zhi Bo at Jin Yang.
Han Kang Zi defeated Zhi Bo at Jinyang.

cells.content: 五。襄子敗智伯晉陽，與魏、韓三分其地。
cells.translation: Fifth year: Xiang Zi defeated Zhi Bo at Jin Yang, and together with Wei and Han divided his territory into three parts.

cells.content: 二十五。晉大夫智開率其邑來奔。
cells.translation: Twenty-fifth year: Jin grandee Zhi Kai led his city in coming to submit.
26th year. Left Chancellor built walls at Nandeng.
5th year. Song Jing Gong passed away.
Emperor Yuan of Han ascended the throne.
39th year. Cai Hou Qi, first year.
6th year. Song Zhao Gong, first year.
Twenty-eighth year: The Yue people came to welcome the princess.

cells.content: 二十九。晉大夫智寬率其邑人來奔。
cells.translation: 29th year. Jin grand officer Zhi Kuan led his townspeople to defect.
Forty-fourth year: Extinguished Qi. Qi was a descendant of Xia.
33rd year. Attacked Yiqu, captured their king.
Thirty-fourth year: Solar eclipse, daytime darkness. Stars appeared.
Jin You Gong Liu, first year. Subjugated Han and Wei.
8th year. Sixth month, snow fell. Sun and moon eclipsed.
Chu Jian Wang Zhong, first year. Extinguished Ju.

cells.content: 十三。義渠伐秦，侵至渭陽。
cells.translation: 13th year. Yiqu attacked Qin, invaded as far as Weiyang.
Qin Huai Gong, first year. Ling Gong was born.
4th year. Lu Yuan Gong, first year.

cells.content: 四。庶長晁殺懷公。太子蚤死，大臣立太子之子，為靈公。
cells.translation: Fourth year: Shu Zhang Quan killed Huai Gong. The crown prince died early; ministers established the crown prince's son as Ling Gong.
Wei Dao Gong Wei, first year.
Qin Ling Gong, first year. Gave birth to Xian Gong.
Wei Wen Hou Si, first year.
2nd year. Zheng You Gong, first year. Han killed him.

cells.content: 三。鄭立幽公子，為繻公，元年。
cells.translation: Third year: Zheng established the younger son of You as Xu Gong, first year.

cells.content: 五。魏誅晉幽公，立其弟止。
cells.translation: 5th year. Wei executed Jin You Gong, established his younger brother Zhi.

cells.content: 六。晉烈公止元年。魏城雍梁。
cells.translation: Sixth year: Jin Lie Gong's first year. Wei built Yongliang.

cells.content: 八。城塹河瀕。初以君主妻河。
cells.translation: 8th year. Built city walls along the river banks. First time using the ruler to sacrifice to the river.

cells.content: 十。補龐，城籍姑。靈公卒，立其季父悼子，是為簡公。
cells.translation: 10th year. Repaired Pang, built walls at Jigu. Ling Gong passed away, established his uncle Dao Zi, this was Jian Gong.
11th year. Wei Shen Gong, first year.
10th year. Zhongshan Wu Gong first ascended the throne.
2nd year. Fought with Jin, defeated Zheng at Xia.

cells.content: 四十三。伐晉，毀黃城，圍陽狐。
cells.translation: 43rd year. Attacked Jin, destroyed Huang city, besieged Yanghu.

cells.content: 十三。公子擊圍繁龐，出其民。
cells.translation: 13th year. Prince Ji besieged Fanpang, expelled its people.
Forty-fourth year: Attacked Lu, Ju, and Anyang.
6th year. First ordered officials to wear swords.
Sixteenth year: Attacked Qin, built Lin Jin and Yuan Li.
Seventh year: Dug trenches in Luo, built the city of Chong Quan. First levied grain tax.

cells.content: 十七。擊守中山。伐秦至鄭，還築洛陰、合陽。
cells.translation: 17th year. Attacked and defended Zhongshan. Attacked Qin to Zheng, returned and built Luoyin and Heyang.

cells.content: 韓景侯虔元年。伐鄭，取雍丘。鄭城京。
cells.translation: Han Jing Hou Qian, first year. Attacked Zheng, took Yong Qiu. Zheng built Jing city.

cells.content: 趙烈侯籍元年。魏使太子伐中山。
cells.translation: Zhao Lie Hou Ji, first year. Wei sent the crown prince to attack Zhongshan.

cells.content: 十八。文侯受經子夏。過段干木之閭常式。
cells.translation: Eighteenth year: Wen Hou received the classics from Zi Xia. When passing Duan Gan Mu's gate, he always bowed from his chariot.
2nd year. Zheng defeated Han at Fushu.

cells.content: 楚聲王當元年。魯穆公元年
cells.translation: Chu Sheng Wang Dang, first year. Lu Mu Gong, first year.

cells.content: 四十九。與鄭會于西城。伐衛，取毌。
cells.translation: 49th year. Met with Zheng at Xicheng. Attacked Wei, took Wu.
Twentieth year: Divined for a chancellor; Li Ke and Di Huang contended.
51st year. Tian Hui rebelled from Linqiu.
5th year. Wei, Han, and Zhao first ranked as feudal lords.
2nd year. Song Dao Gong, first year.

cells.content: 七。烈侯好音，欲賜歌者田，徐越侍以仁義，乃止。
cells.translation: 7th year. Marquis Lie enjoyed music and wanted to grant fields to singers, but Xu Yue counseled him with benevolence and righteousness, so he stopped.
Twenty-fourth year: Qin attacked us, reaching Yang Hu.
Chu Dao Wang Lei, first year.
25th year. Crown Prince Ying was born.
Second year: The three Jin states came to attack us, reaching Cheng Qiu.
Twenty-sixth year: Mount Guo collapsed, blocking the Yellow River.
Second year: Zheng killed their chancellor Si Zi Yang.

cells.content: 四。敗鄭師，圍鄭。鄭人殺子陽。
cells.translation: Fourth year: Defeated the Zheng army, besieged Zheng. The Zheng people killed Zi Yang.

cells.content: 三。（鄭人殺君）三月，盜殺韓相俠累。
cells.translation: 3rd year. (Zheng people killed their ruler) In the third month, bandits killed Han Prime Minister Xia Lei.

cells.content: 四。鄭相子陽之徒殺其君繻公。
cells.translation: Fourth year: Zheng chancellor Zi Yang's followers killed their lord Xu Gong.
5th year. Zheng Kang Gong, first year.
10th year. Song Xiu Gong, first year.
Sixth year: Saved Lu. Zheng Fu Shu rebelled.
Eleventh year: Attacked Lu, took Zui.
Thirty-second year: Attacked Zheng, built the city of Suan Zao.
Ninth year: Attacked Han, took Fu Shu.
Thirty-third year: Jin Xiao Gong Qing, first year.
Ninth year: Attacked Han's Yi Yang, took six towns.
Ninth year: Qin attacked Yi Yang, took six towns.
Tenth year: Fought with Jin at Wu Cheng. Established the county of Shan.
Thirty-fifth year: Qi attacked and took Xiang Ling.
Fifteenth year: Lu defeated us at Ping Lu.
Eleventh year: The crown prince was born.
Thirty-sixth year: Qin invaded Yin Jin.
Sixteenth year: Met with Jin and Wei at Zhu Ze.
Thirteenth year: Shu took our Nan Zheng.

cells.content: 魏武侯。。元年。襲邯鄲，敗焉。
cells.translation: Wei Wu Hou, first year. Attacked Handan, was defeated.

cells.content: 趙敬侯元年。武公子朝作亂，奔魏。
cells.translation: Zhao Jing Hou, first year. Wu Gong Zi Chao rebelled, fled to Wei.

cells.content: 十九。田常曾孫田和始列為諸侯。遷康公海上，食一城。
cells.translation: Nineteenth year: Tian Chang's great-grandson Tian He began to be ranked as a feudal lord. Moved Kang Gong to the seacoast, giving him one city for sustenance.

cells.content: 二。庶長改迎靈公太子，立為獻公。誅出公。
cells.translation: Second year: Shu Zhang Gai welcomed the Ling Gong crown prince and established him as Xian Gong. Executed Chu Gong.
Second year: Built the cities of An Yi and Wang Yuan.

cells.content: 二。伐鄭，取陽城。伐宋，到彭城，執宋君。
cells.translation: Second year: Attacked Zheng and took Yangcheng. Attacked Song, reached Pengcheng, and captured the Song ruler.
Twentieth year: Attacked Lu, defeated them. Tian He died.

cells.content: 二十一。田和子桓公午立。
cells.translation: Twenty-first year: Tian He's son Huan Gong Wu established.
Second year: Built the city of Que Yang.
Fourth year: Xiao Gong was born.
Seventh year: Attacked Qi, reaching Sang Qiu.
Seventh year: Attacked Qi, reaching Sang Qiu. Zheng defeated Jin.
Seventh year: Attacked Qi, reaching Sang Qiu.
Twenty-fifth year: Attacked Yan, took Sang Qiu.
Sixth year: First established counties of Pu, Lan Tian, and Shan Ming.

cells.content: 二十六。康公卒，田氏遂并齊而有之。太公望之後絕祀。
cells.translation: Twenty-sixth year: Kang Gong died; the Tian clan then annexed Qi and possessed it. The descendants of Tai Gong Wang had their sacrifices cut off.

cells.content: 九。翟敗我澮。伐齊，至靈丘。
cells.translation: Ninth year: Di defeated us at Hua. Attacked Qi, reaching Ling Qiu.
Ninth year: Attacked Qi, reaching Ling Qiu.
Ninth year: Attacked Qi, reaching Ling Qiu.

cells.content: 齊威王因元年。自田常至威王，威王始以齊彊天下。
cells.translation: Qi Wei Wang Yin, first year. From Tian Chang to Wei Wang, Wei Wang first made Qi strong in the world.
Tenth year: Jin Jing Gong Ju Jiu, first year.
Fourth year: Shu attacked our Zi Fang.

cells.content: 十一。魏、韓、趙滅晉，絕無後。
cells.translation: Eleventh year: Wei, Han, and Zhao extinguished Jin, leaving no descendants.
Han Ai Hou, first year. Divided the Jin state.
Eleventh year: Divided the Jin state.

cells.content: 二。滅鄭。康公二十年滅，無後。
cells.translation: Second year: Extinguished Zheng. Kang Gong was extinguished in his twentieth year, leaving no descendants.

cells.content: 六。魯伐入陽關。晉伐到鱄陵。
cells.translation: Sixth year: Lu attacked and entered Yang Guan. Jin attacked and reached Wei Ling.

cells.content: 十五。衛聲公元年。敗趙北藺。
cells.translation: Fifteenth year: Wei Sheng Gong, first year. Defeated Zhao at Bei Lin.

cells.content: 三。伐衛，取都鄙七十三。魏敗我藺。
cells.translation: Third year: Attacked Wei, took seventy-three outer cities. Wei defeated us at Lin.
Sixteenth year: Attacked Chu, took Lu Yang.
Sixth year: Han Yan killed his ruler.
Tenth year: Wei took our Lu Yang.
Fifth year: Attacked Qi at Zhen. Wei defeated us at Huai.
Sixteenth year: Great epidemic among the people. Solar eclipse.
Second year: Wei defeated us at Ma Ling.
Sixth year. Defeated Wei at Zhuoze, besieged King Hui.
Chu Xuan Wang Liang Fu, first year.
Tenth year: Song Ti Cheng, first year.

cells.content: 十七。櫟陽雨金，四月至八月。
cells.translation: Seventeenth year: Gold rained in Queyang, from fourth month to eighth month.
Third year: Qi attacked our Guan.
Seventh year: Invaded Qi, reaching the Great Wall.

cells.content: 十一。伐魏取觀。趙侵我長城。
cells.translation: 11th year: Attacked Wei and took Guan. Zhao invaded our Great Wall.
19th year: Defeated Han and Wei at Luoyin.
5th year: Met with Han at Zhaiyang. Built the city of Wudu.
Sixth year. Attacked Song, took Yitai.

cells.content: 二十一。章蟜與晉戰石門，。。斬首六萬，天子賀。
cells.translation: Twenty-first year. Zhang Xi fought with Jin at Shimen, beheaded 60,000; the Son of Heaven felicitated him.

cells.content: 二十三。與魏戰少梁，虜其太子。
cells.translation: Twenty-third year. Fought with Wei at Shaoliang, captured their crown prince.

cells.content: 九。與秦戰少梁，虜我太子。
cells.translation: Ninth year: Fought with Qin at Shao Liang; they captured our crown prince.

cells.content: 九。魏敗我于澮。大雨三月。
cells.translation: Ninth year. Wei defeated us at Kuai. Great rain for three months.
Thirteenth year. Wei defeated us at Kuai.

cells.content: 秦孝公元年。彗星見西方。
cells.translation: Qin Xiao Gong, first year. Comet seen in the west.

cells.content: 十。取趙皮牢。衛成侯元年。
cells.translation: Tenth year. Took Zhao's Pilao. Wei Cheng Hou, first year.
Ninth year. Sent sacrificial meat to Qin.
Twelfth year: Star fell in daytime with sound.

cells.content: 韓昭侯元年。秦敗我西山。
cells.translation: Han Zhao Hou, first year. Qin defeated us in the Western Mountains.

cells.content: 二十一。鄒忌以鼓琴見威王。
cells.translation: Twenty-first year: Zou Ji appeared before Wei Wang by playing zither.

cells.content: 二。宋取我黃池。魏取我朱。
cells.translation: Second year. Song took our Huangchi. Wei took our Zhu.
Thirteenth year: Jun Yin Hei welcomed a woman from Qin.
Twenty-second year: Enfeoffed Zou Ji as Cheng Hou.
Fifteenth year: The Lu, Wei, Song, and Zheng hou came.

cells.content: 十九。與燕會阿。與齊、宋會平陸。
cells.translation: Nineteenth year. Met with Yan at E. Met with Qi and Song at Pinglu.
Twenty-third year. Met with Zhao at Pinglu.
Seventh year: Met with the Wei king at Du Ping.

cells.content: 十六。與秦孝公會杜平。侵宋黃池，宋復取之。
cells.translation: Sixteenth year. Met with Qin Xiao Gong at Duping. Invaded Song's Huangchi, Song subsequently took it back.
Twenty-fourth year. Met with Wei for a hunt in the suburbs.

cells.content: 八。與魏戰元里，斬首七千，取少梁。
cells.translation: Eighth year. Fought with Wei at Yuanli, beheaded 7,000, took Shaoliang.

cells.content: 十七。與秦戰元里，秦取我少梁。
cells.translation: Seventeenth year. Fought with Qin at Yuanli, Qin took our Shaoliang.
Twenty-first year. Wei besieged our Handan.

cells.content: 十八。邯鄲降。齊敗我桂陵。
cells.translation: Eighteenth year. Handan surrendered. Qi defeated us at Guilong.
Sixth year. Attacked Eastern Zhou, took Lingguan and Linqiu.
Twenty-sixth year. Defeated Wei at Guilong.

cells.content: 十。衛公孫鞅為大良造，伐安邑，降之。
cells.translation: Tenth year. Wei Gongsun Yang became Grand Commander, attacked Anyi and it surrendered.

cells.content: 十九。諸侯圍我襄陵。築長城，塞固陽。
cells.translation: Nineteenth year: The feudal lords besieged us at Xiangling. Built the long wall and blocked Gu Yang.

cells.content: 十一。城商塞。衛鞅圍固陽，降之。
cells.translation: Eleventh year. Built Shang Pass. Wei Yang besieged Guyang and it surrendered.
Eighth year: Shen Bu Hai served as chancellor.

cells.content: 二十四。魏歸邯鄲，與魏盟漳水上。
cells.translation: Twenty-fourth year. Wei returned Handan, formed alliance with Wei on the Zhang River.

cells.content: 十二。初聚小邑為三十一縣，令。為田開阡陌。
cells.translation: Twelfth year. First gathered small settlements into thirty-one counties, decreed. For farmland, opened up the ridges and paths.
Twenty-first year. Encountered Qin at Tong.
Thirteenth year. First became a historian, ranked historian.
Tenth year: Han Ji assassinated her ruler Dao Gong.

cells.content: 三。公子范襲邯鄲，不勝，死。
cells.translation: Third year. Lord Fan attacked Handan, was unsuccessful, died.
Twenty-fifth year: The feudal lords assembled.

cells.content: 二十七。丹封名會。丹，魏大臣。
cells.translation: Twenty-seventh year. Dan enfeoffed Ming Hui. Dan, Wei high minister.
Thirty-fifth year. Tian Ji attacked Qi, was unsuccessful.

cells.content: 十九。城武城。從東方牡丘來歸。天子致伯。
cells.translation: Nineteenth year. Built Wucheng. from the east, Muqiu came to submit. Son of Heaven sent earl.
Twenty-seventh year: Lu Jing Gong Jian, first year.

cells.content: 二十。諸侯畢賀。會諸侯于澤。朝天子。
cells.translation: Twentieth year. all feudal lords Congratulated. met with feudal lords at Ze. paid court to the Son of Heaven.
Twenty-ninth year: The Zhongshan jun served as chancellor.
21st year. horse gave birth to human.

cells.content: 三十。齊虜我太子申，殺將軍龐涓。
cells.translation: Thirtieth year. Qi captured us Crown Prince Shen, killed General Pang Juan.

cells.content: 二。敗魏馬陵。田忌、田嬰、田馊將，孫子為師。
cells.translation: Second year: Defeated Wei at Ma Ling. Tian Ji, Tian Ying, and Tian Chou commanded; Sun Zi was the strategist.

cells.content: 三十一。秦商君伐我，虜我公子卬。
cells.translation: Thirty-first year: Qin Shang Jun attacked us and captured our Gongzi Ang.
Third year. met with Zhao, attacked Wei.
Twenty-third year. fought with Jin at Anmen.
Chu Wei Wang Xiong Shang, first year.

cells.content: 二十四。（秦）大荔圍合陽。孝公薨。商君反，死彤地。
cells.translation: Twenty-fourth year. (Qin) Dali Besieged Heyang. Xiao Gongpassed away. Shang Jun rebelled, died Tong.

cells.content: 三十三。衛鞅亡歸我，我恐，弗內。
cells.translation: Thirty-third year. Wei Yang fled and returned to us, we feared, did not admit.

cells.content: 秦惠文王元年。楚、韓、趙、蜀人來。
cells.translation: Qin Hui Wen Wang, first year. People from Chu, Han, Zhao, and Shu came.
22nd year. Shen Bu Hai passed away.

cells.content: 二。天子賀。行錢。宋太丘社亡。
cells.translation: Second year. Son of Heaven Congratulated. circulated money. Song Taiqiu She fled.

cells.content: 三十五。孟子來，王問利國，對曰：「君不可言利。」
cells.translation: Thirty-fifth year: Meng Zi came; the king asked about benefiting the state, and he replied: 'The ruler cannot speak of profit.'
Seventh year. met with Wei at Ping'a Nan.
Third year: The king was crowned. Captured Han Yiyang.
Twenty-fourth year. Qin captured our Yiyang
Eighth year. met with Wei at Zhen.

cells.content: 四。天子致文武胙。魏夫人來。
cells.translation: Fourth year. Son of Heaven sent Wen Wu sacrificial meat. Wei furen came.

cells.content: 魏襄王元年。與諸侯會徐州，以相王。
cells.translation: Wei Xiang Wang, first year. Met with the feudal lords at Xuzhou, mutually recognized as kings.

cells.content: 二十五。旱。作高門，屈宜臼曰「昭侯不出此門。」
九。與魏會徐州，諸侯相王。
五。陰晉人犀首為大良造。
cells.translation: 5th year. Yinjin man Xi Shou became Grand Commander.

cells.content: 二十六。高門成，昭侯卒，不出此門。
cells.translation: Twenty-sixth year: The high gate was completed; Zhao Hou died and did not exit through this gate.

cells.content: 六。魏以陰晉為和，命曰寧秦。
cells.translation: 6th year. Wei made Yinjin peace, named it Ningqin.
Han Xuan Hui Wang, first year.

cells.content: 十八。齊、魏伐我，我決河水浸之。
七。義渠內亂，庶長操將兵定之。

cells.translation: 8th year. Wei entered Hexi territory at Qin.

cells.content: 五。與秦河西地少梁。秦圍我焦、曲沃。
九。度河，取汾陰、皮氏。圍焦，降之。與魏會應。
六。與秦會應。秦取汾陰、皮氏。
cells.translation: 6th year. met with Qin at Ying.Qin took Fenyin、Pishi.

cells.content: 十。張儀相。公子桑圍蒲陽，降之。魏納上郡。
cells.translation: Tenth year: Zhang Yi served as chancellor. Gongzi Sang besieged Pu Yang and it surrendered. Wei ceded Shang Jun.
Chu Huai Wang Huai, first year.
Fifteenth year: Song Jun Jian, first year.

cells.content: 十一。義渠君為臣。歸魏焦、曲沃。

cells.translation: 8th year. Qin returned Jiao and Quwo to us.
12th year. first La sacrifice, met at Longmen.

cells.content: 趙武靈王元年。魏敗我趙護。
cells.translation: Zhao Wu Ling Wang, first year. Wei defeated our Zhao Hu.

cells.content: 相張儀將兵取陝。初更元年
cells.translation: Prime Minister Zhang Yi led troops to take Shan. First year of the new calendar.

cells.content: 二。相張儀與齊、楚會齧桑。

cells.translation: Tenth year: The ruler became king.
Tenth year: The ruler became king.
Third year: Zhang Yi was dismissed as chancellor and became chancellor of Wei.

cells.content: 十三。秦取曲沃。平周女化為丈夫。

cells.translation: 5th year. took a Han woman as consort.
Fifth year: The king toured north to the Rong lands, reaching the Yellow River.

cells.content: 七。五國共擊秦，不勝而還。
cells.translation: 7th year. five states jointly attacked Qin, were unsuccessful and returned.
Sixth year: Song established himself as king.

cells.content: 八。與韓、趙戰，斬首八萬。張儀復相。

cells.translation: 2nd year. 2nd year. Qi defeated us at Guanze.

cells.content: 十六。秦敗我脩魚，得將軍申差。
九。與韓、魏擊秦。齊敗我觀澤。
cells.translation: 9th year. with Han and Wei attacked Qin.Qi defeated us at Guanze.

cells.content: 九。擊蜀，滅之。取趙中都、西陽。
cells.translation: 9th year. attacked Shu, destroyed it.took Zhao Zhongdu and Xiyang.

cells.content: 五。君讓其臣子之國，顧為臣。

cells.translation: Eleventh year: Qin defeated our general Ying.

cells.content: 十一。侵義渠，得二十五城。
cells.translation: 11th year. invaded Yiqu, got twenty-five cities.

cells.content: 五。秦拔我曲沃，歸其人。走犀首岸門。
cells.translation: 5th year. Qin captured our Quwo, returned their people.Xi Shou fled to Anmen.
Fifteenth year: Lu Ping Gong, first year.

cells.content: 七。君噲及太子相子之皆死。
cells.translation: Seventh year: Jun Kuai and Crown Prince Xiang Zi both died.

cells.content: 十二。樗里子擊藺陽，虜趙將。公子繇通封蜀。
cells.translation: Twelfth year: Chu Li Zi attacked Lin Yang and captured a Zhao general. Gongzi You was enfeoffed and opened up Shu.

cells.content: 六。秦來立公子政為太子。與秦王會臨晉。
cells.translation: Sixth year: Qin came and established Gongzi Zheng as crown prince. Met with the Qin king at Lin Jin.

cells.content: 十三。秦拔我藺，虜將趙莊。
cells.translation: Thirteenth year: Qin captured our Lin and took general Zhao Zhuang prisoner.
Sixteenth year: Zhang Yi came to serve as chancellor.

cells.content: 十三。庶長章擊楚，斬首八萬。
cells.translation: 13th year. Shuzhang Zhang attacked Chu, beheaded eighty thousand.

cells.content: 七。擊齊，虜聲子於濮。與秦擊燕。
cells.translation: 7th year. attacked Qi, captured Shengzi at Pu.with Qin attacked Yan.

cells.content: 二十一。我秦攻楚，圍景座。
cells.translation: 21st year. with Qin attacked Chu, besieged Jingzuo.
Seventeenth year: Qin defeated our general Qu Dun.
Ninth year: The Yan people together established Gongzi Ping.
Fourteenth year: The Shu chancellor killed the Shu hou.
King Xiang of Han, first year
King Zhao of Yan, first year

cells.content: 秦武王元年。誅蜀相壯。張儀、魏章皆出之魏。
cells.translation: Qin Wu Wang, first year. Executed the Shu chancellor Zhuang. Zhang Yi and Wei Zhang were both sent out to Wei.
9th year. met with Qin at Linjin.

cells.content: 十六。吳廣入女，生子何，立為惠王后。
cells.translation: Sixteenth year: Wu Guang married a woman, gave birth to Zi He, established as Hui Wang's consort.

cells.content: 二。初置丞相，樗里子、甘茂為丞相。
cells.translation: Second year: First established the position of chancellor; Chu Li Zi and Gan Mao became chancellors.
11th year. met with Qin at Ying.

cells.content: 四。與秦會臨晉。秦擊我宜陽。
cells.translation: 4th year. met with Qin at Linjin.Qin attacked our Yiyang.

cells.content: 四。拔宜陽城，斬首六萬。涉河，城武遂。
cells.translation: Fourth year. Captured Yiyang, beheaded sixty thousand. Crossed the river, built Wushui.
Twelfth year: The crown prince went to court Qin.

cells.content: 五。秦拔我宜陽，斬首六萬。
cells.translation: 5th year. Qin captured our Yiyang, beheaded sixty thousand.
King Zhao Xiang of Qin, first year

cells.content: 十三。秦擊皮氏，未拔而解。
cells.translation: 13th year. Qin attacked Pishi, did not capture and withdrew.
6th year. Qin again disputed Wushui with us.
Second year: Comet appeared. Sang Jun created disorder and was executed.
Fourteenth year: Qin Wu Wang's consort returned.

cells.content: 二十五。與秦王會黃觉，秦復歸我上庸。
cells.translation: Twenty-fifth year: Met with the Qin king at Huang Jue; Qin returned Shang Yong to us.

cells.content: 十六。秦拔我蒲阪、晉陽、封陵。
cells.translation: 16th year. Qin captured our Puban and Jinyang、enfeoffed Ling.
Twenty-sixth year: The crown prince was hostage in Qin.
Fifth year: The Wei king came to court.

cells.content: 十七。與秦會臨晉，復歸我蒲阪。
cells.translation: 17th year. met with Qin at Linjin, returned our Puban.

cells.content: 十。太子嬰與秦王會臨晉，因至咸陽而歸。
cells.translation: Tenth year: Crown Prince Ying met with the Qin king at Lin Jin, then went to Xianyang and returned.

cells.content: 六。蜀反，司馬錯往誅蜀守煇，定蜀。日蝕，晝晦。伐楚。
cells.translation: 6th year. Shu rebelled, Sima Cuo went to execute Shu governor Hui, pacified Shu.Solar eclipse, day darkened.Attacked Chu.

cells.content: 十一。秦取我穰。與秦擊楚。
cells.translation: 11th year. Qin took our Rang.with Qin attacked Chu.

cells.content: 二十五。趙攻中山。惠后卒。
cells.translation: Twenty-fifth year: Zhao attacked Zhongshan. Hui Hou died.

cells.content: 二十八。秦、韓、魏、齊敗我將軍唐眛於重丘。
cells.translation: Twenty-eighth year: Qin, Han, Wei, and Qi defeated our general Tang Mei at Chong Qiu.

cells.content: 二十三。與秦擊楚，使公子將，大有功。
cells.translation: Twenty-third year: Together with Qin attacked Chu, sent a prince as general, achieved great merit.

cells.content: 七。樗里疾卒。擊楚，斬首三萬。魏冉為相。
cells.translation: Seventh year: Chu Li Ji died. Attacked Chu and beheaded 30,000. Wei Ran became chancellor.

cells.content: 二十九。秦取我襄城，殺景缺。
cells.translation: Qin took our Xiangcheng, killed Jing Que.

cells.content: 二十四。秦使涇陽君來為質。
cells.translation: Twenty-fourth year: Qin sent Jing Yang Jun to come as hostage.
Eighth year: The Chu king came and was detained.
Twentieth year: Met with the Qi king at Han.

cells.content: 十三。齊、魏王來。立咎為太子。
cells.translation: Thirteenth year: The Qi and Wei kings came. Established Jiu as crown prince.

cells.content: 三十。王入秦。秦取我八城。
cells.translation: Thirtieth year: The king entered Qin. Qin took eight of our cities.

cells.content: 二十五。涇陽君復歸秦。薛文入相秦。
cells.translation: Twenty-fifth year: Jing Yang Jun returned to Qin. Xue Wen entered as Qin chancellor.

cells.content: 二十一。與齊、韓共擊秦于函谷。河、渭絕一日。
cells.translation: 21st year. with Qi、Hanjointly attacked Qin at Hangu.Yellow River and Wei River stopped flowing for one day.

cells.content: 趙惠文王元年。以公子勝為相，封平原君。
cells.translation: Zhao Hui Wen Wang, first year. Made Gongzi Sheng chancellor, enfeoffed as Ping Yuan Jun.

cells.content: 楚頃襄王元年。秦取我十六城
cells.translation: Chu Qing Xiang Wang, first year. Qin took sixteen of our cities.

cells.content: 二十六。與魏、韓共擊秦。孟嘗君歸相齊。
cells.translation: Twenty-sixth year: Together with Wei and Han attacked Qin. Meng Chang Jun returned to serve as Qi chancellor.

cells.content: 十。楚懷王亡之趙，趙弗內。
cells.translation: Tenth year: Chu Hui Wang fled to Zhao, but Zhao did not admit him.
Second year: Chu Hui Wang fled and came, but we did not admit him.

cells.content: 十一。彗星見。復與魏封陵。
cells.translation: 11th year. comet appeared.again with Wei enfeoffed Ling.

cells.content: 十六。（與齊魏擊秦）秦與我武遂和。
cells.translation: 16th year. (with Qi and Wei attacked Qin) Qin made peace with us at Wushui.
Third year: Hui Wang died in Qin and came back for burial.

cells.content: 十二。樓緩免。穰侯魏冉為丞相。
cells.translation: Twelfth year: Lou Huan was dismissed. Rang Hou Wei Ran became chancellor.

cells.content: 魏昭王元年。秦尉錯來擊我襄。
cells.translation: Wei Zhao Wang, first year. Qin Wei Cuo came to attack our Xiang.
King Xi of Han, Jiu, first year

cells.content: 四。圍殺主父。與齊、燕共滅中山。
cells.translation: 4th year. besieged and killed Zhu Fu.with Qi、Yanjointly destroyed Zhongshan.
Fourth year: Lu Wen Gong, first year.
13th year. appointed Bi as governor of Hanzhong.
2nd year. 2nd year. fought with Qin, we were disadvantaged.

cells.content: 三十。田甲劫王，相薛文走。
cells.translation: Thirtieth year: Tian Jia kidnapped the king; Chancellor Xue Wen fled.

cells.content: 十四。白起擊伊闕，斬首二十四萬。
cells.translation: 14th year. Bai Qi attacked Yique, beheaded two hundred forty thousand.

cells.content: 三。佐韓擊秦，秦敗我兵伊闕。
cells.translation: 3rd year. 3rd year. assisted Han in attacking Qin, Qin defeated our troops at Yique.

cells.content: 三。秦敗我伊闕，斬首二十四萬，虜將喜。
cells.translation: Third year: Qin defeated us at Yi Que, beheaded 240,000, and captured general Xi.
Fifteenth year: Wei Ran was dismissed as chancellor.
Fifth year. Qin captured our Wancheng.
17th year. Wei entered Hedong for four hundred li.
6th year. Mang Hao was valued for his cunning.

cells.content: 六。與秦武遂地方二百里。
cells.translation: 6th year. with Qin gave Wushui area two hundred li.

cells.content: 十八。客卿錯擊魏，至軹，取城大小六十一。
cells.translation: 18th year. guest minister Cuo attacked Wei, reached Zhi, took and built sixty-one cities large and small.

cells.content: 七。秦擊我。取城大小六十一。
cells.translation: 7th year. Qin attacked us.took and built sixty-one cities large and small.

cells.content: 十九。十月為帝，十二月復為王。任鄙卒。
cells.translation: Nineteenth year: In the tenth month became emperor, in the twelfth month reverted to king. Ren Bi died.

cells.content: 三十六。為東帝二月，復為王。
cells.translation: Thirty-sixth year: Served as Eastern Emperor for two months, then reverted to king.

cells.content: 九。秦拔我新垣、曲陽之城。
cells.translation: 9th year. Qin captured our Xinyuan and Quyang cities.

cells.content: 二十一。魏納安邑及河內。
cells.translation: 21st year. Wei accepted Anyi and Henan.
Tenth year: The Song king died at our Wen.
10th year. Qin defeated our troops at Xiashan.
14th year. met with Qin at Zhongyang.
14th year. met with Qin at Wan.
Qin captured our Lie and built nine cities.

cells.content: 二十三。尉斯離與韓、魏、燕、趙共擊齊，破之。
cells.translation: 23rd year. Wei Si Li with Han, Wei, Yan, Zhao jointly attacked Qi and defeated them.

cells.content: 十二。與秦擊齊濟西。與秦王會西周。
cells.translation: Twelfth year: Together with Qin attacked Qi at Ji Xi. Met with the Qin king at Western Zhou.

cells.content: 十二。與秦擊齊濟西。與秦王會西周。
cells.translation: Twelfth year: Together with Qin attacked Qi at Ji Xi. Met with the Qin king at Western Zhou.

cells.content: 二十八。與秦、三晉擊齊，燕獨入至臨菑，取其寶器。
cells.translation: with Qin and Three Jin attacked Qi, Yan alone entered Lingqi, took their precious vessels.

cells.content: 四十。五國共擊湣王，王走莒。
cells.translation: Fortieth year: Five states together attacked Min Wang; the king fled to Ju.

cells.content: 十三。秦拔我安城，兵至大梁而還。
cells.translation: Thirteenth year. Qin captured our Ancheng, troops reached Daxiang and returned.
Sixteenth year: Met with the Qin king at Rang.
King Xiang of Qi, Fa Zhang, first year
Fourteenth year: Great flood. Wei Huai Jun, first year.
Fourteenth year. Met with Qin between the two Zhou.
Seventeenth year. Qin captured our Liangcheng.
Twenty-sixth year: Wei Ran again became chancellor.
Eighteenth year. Qin captured our Shicheng.

cells.content: 二十七。擊趙，斬首三萬。地動，壞城。
cells.translation: attacked Zhao, beheaded thirty thousand.earthquake, destroyed cities.

cells.content: 十九。秦敗我軍，斬首三萬。
cells.translation: 19th year. Qin defeated our army, beheaded thirty thousand.

cells.content: 十九。秦擊我，與秦漢北及上庸地。
cells.translation: 19th year. Qin attacked us, gave Qin Hanbei and Shangyong territory.

cells.content: 二十。與秦會黽池，藺相如從。
cells.translation: Twentieth year: Met with Qin at Meng Chi; Lin Xiang Ru accompanied.
20th year. Qin captured Chong and Xiling.
5th year. killed Yan general Ji Jie.

cells.content: 二十九。白起擊楚，拔郢，更東至竟陵，以為南郡。
cells.translation: Bai Qi attacked Chu, captured Ying, then moved east to Jingling, made it Nanguo commandery.

cells.content: 二十一。秦拔我郢，燒夷陵，王亡走陳。
cells.translation: Twenty-first year: Qin captured our Ying, burned Yiling; the king fled to Chen.
King Hui of Yan, first year
Thirtieth year: Bai Qi was enfeoffed as Wu An Jun.
22nd year. Qin captured our Wu and Qianzhong.

cells.content: 魏安釐王元年。秦拔我兩城。封弟公子無忌為信陵君。
cells.translation: Wei An Li Wang, first year. Qin captured two of our cities. Enfeoffed younger brother Gongzi Wu Ji as Xin Ling Jun.

cells.content: 二十三。秦所拔我江旁反秦。
cells.translation: 23rd year. Qiang captives from Jiangpan rebelled against Qin.

cells.content: 二。秦拔我兩城，軍大梁下，韓來救，與秦溫以和。
cells.translation: Second year. Qin captured our Liangcheng, army reached below Daxiang, Han came to rescue, made peace with Qin at Wen.

cells.content: 二十一。暴鳶救魏，為秦所敗，走開封。
cells.translation: 21st year. Bao Yuan rescued Wei, was defeated by Qin, fled and was enfeoffed at Kai.

cells.content: 三。秦拔我四城，斬首四萬。
cells.translation: 3rd year. 3rd year. Qin captured our Si cities, beheaded forty thousand.

cells.content: 三十四。白起擊魏華陽軍，芒卯走，得三晉將，斬首十五萬。
cells.translation: Thirty-fourth year: Bai Qi attacked Wei's Hua Yang army; Mang Mao fled; got the three Jin generals and beheaded 150,000.
4th year. made peace with Qin at Nanyang.
King Huan Hui of Han, first year

cells.content: 二十七。擊燕。魯頃公元年。
cells.translation: Twenty-seventh year: Attacked Yan. Lu Qing Gong, first year.

cells.content: 二十八。藺相如攻齊，至平邑。
cells.translation: Twenty-eighth year: Lin Xiang Ru attacked Qi and reached Ping Yi.
King Wu Cheng of Yan, first year
Third year. Qin attacked our Yancheng, did not capture.

cells.content: 二十九。秦攻韓閼與。趙奢將擊秦，大敗之，賜號曰馬服。
cells.translation: Twenty-ninth year: Qin attacked Han's Yan Yu. Zhao She commanded and attacked Qin, greatly defeating them; granted the title Ma Fu.
14th year. Qin and Chu attacked our Gangshou.
Ninth year. Qin captured our Huaicheng.

cells.content: 四十。太子質於魏者死，歸葬芷陽。
cells.translation: Fortieth year: The crown prince who was hostage in Wei died and was returned for burial at Zhi Yang.

cells.content: 四十二。宣太后薨。安國君為太子。
cells.translation: Forty-second year: Xuan Tai Hou died. An Guo Jun became crown prince.

cells.content: 趙孝成王元年。秦拔我三城。平原君相。
cells.translation: Zhao Xiao Cheng Wang, first year. Qin captured three of our cities. Ping Yuan Jun served as chancellor.
7th year. Qi Tian Dan captured Zhongyang.
Ninth year. Qin captured our Xingcheng, built Fenpan.
King Jian of Qi, first year
10th year. Qin attacked our Tai, circulated.

cells.content: 楚考烈王元年。秦取我州。黃歇為相。
cells.translation: Chu Kao Lie Wang, first year. Qin took our Zhou. Huang Xie served as chancellor.
Forty-sixth year: The king went to Nan Zheng.
5th year. sent Lian Po to resist Qin at Changping.

cells.content: 四十七。白起破趙長平，殺卒四十五萬。
cells.translation: Bai Qi defeated Zhao at Changping, beheaded four hundred fifty thousand.

cells.content: 六。使趙括代廉頗將。白起破括四十五萬。
cells.translation: Sixth year: Sent Zhao Kuo to replace Lian Po as commander. Bai Qi defeated Kuo's 450,000.

cells.content: 五十。王齕、鄭安平圍邯鄲，及齕還軍，拔新中。
cells.translation: Fiftieth year: Wang Yin and Zheng An Ping besieged Han Dan; when Yin withdrew his army, captured Xin Zhong.

cells.content: 二十。公子無忌救邯鄲，秦兵解去。
cells.translation: Twentieth year: Gongzi Wu Ji rescued Han Dan; Qin troops withdrew.

cells.content: 九。秦圍我邯鄲，楚、魏救我。
cells.translation: 9th year. Qin besieged our Handan, Chu and Wei rescued us.
Sixth year: Chun Shen Jun rescued Zhao.
King Xiao of Yan, first year

cells.content: 二十一。韓、魏、楚救趙新中，秦兵罷。
cells.translation: 21st year. Han, Wei, Chu rescued Zhao at Xinzhong, Qin troops withdrew.

cells.content: 十七。秦擊我陽城，救趙新中。
cells.translation: Seventeenth year. Qin attacked our Yangcheng, rescued Zhao at Xinzhong.

cells.content: 五十二。。取西周。王稽棄市。
cells.translation: Fifty-second year. Took Western Zhou. Wang Ji was executed in the marketplace.
Eighth year: Took Lu; the Lu ruler was enfeoffed at Ju.
King Xi of Yan, first year
Twenty-fifth year: Wei Yuan Jun, first year.
Fifteenth year: Ping Yuan Jun died.

cells.content: 四。伐趙，趙破我軍，殺栗腹。
cells.translation: 4th year. Attacked Zhao, Zhao defeated our army, killed Li Fu.
Qin Xiao Wen Wang, first year.

cells.content: 秦莊襄王楚元年。。蒙驁取成皋、滎陽。初置三川郡。呂不韋相。取東周。
cells.translation: Qin Zhuang Xiang Wang Chu, first year. Meng Ao took Cheng Gao and Xing Yang. First established San Chuan commandery. Lü Bu Wei served as chancellor. Took Eastern Zhou.

cells.content: 二十四。秦拔我成皋、滎陽。
cells.translation: Qin captured our Chenggao and Xingyang.

cells.content: 十四。楚滅魯，頃公遷卞，為家人，絕祀。
cells.translation: Fourteenth year: Chu extinguished Lu; Qing Gong moved to Bian, became a commoner, sacrifices cut off.

cells.content: 二。蒙驁擊趙榆次、新城、狼孟，得三十七城。日蝕。
cells.translation: 2nd year. 2nd year. Meng Ao attacked Zhao Yuci, Xin cities, Langmeng, got thirty-seven cities.Solar eclipse.
Fifteenth year: Chun Shen Jun was moved and enfeoffed at Wu.

cells.content: 三。王齮擊上黨。初置太原郡。魏公子無忌率五國卻我軍河外，蒙驁解去，
cells.translation: Third year: Wang Yin attacked Shang Dang. First established Tai Yuan commandery. Wei Gongzi Wu Ji led five states and repelled our army beyond the Yellow River; Meng Ao withdrew.

cells.content: 三十。無忌率五國兵敗秦軍河外。
cells.translation: Wuqi led five states troops defeated Qin army beyond the river.

cells.content: 始皇帝元年。。擊取晉陽，作鄭國渠。
cells.translation: First Emperor first year. Attacked and took Jinyang, made Zhengguo Canal.

cells.content: 三。蒙驁擊韓，取十三城。王齮死。
cells.translation: Third year: Meng Ao attacked Han and took thirteen cities. Wang Yin died.
King Dao Xiang of Zhao, Yan, first year

cells.content: 四。七月，蝗蔽天下。百姓納粟千石，拜爵一級。
cells.translation: 4th year. Seventh month, locusts covered the sky. Common people who accepted thousand bushels of grain received one rank of nobility.
Thirty-fourth year: Xin Ling Jun died.
Second year: The crown prince returned from being hostage in Qin.
12th year. Zhao captured our Wushui and Fang cities.

cells.content: 五。蒙驁取魏酸棗二十城。初置東郡。
cells.translation: 5th year. Meng Ao took Wei Suanzhao twenty cities.first established Dongjun commandery.

cells.content: 魏景湣王元年。秦拔我二十城。
cells.translation: Wei Jing Min Wang, first year. Qin captured twenty of our cities.
Third year: The Zhao chancellor and Wei chancellor met at Ke and formed an alliance.
13th year. Ju Xin died in Zhao.
6th year. five states jointly attacked Qin.

cells.content: 二。秦拔我朝歌。衛從濮陽徙野王。
cells.translation: Second year: Qin captured our Zhao Ge. Wei moved from Pu Yang to Ye Wang.

cells.content: 二十二。王東徙壽春，命曰郢。
cells.translation: Twenty-second year: The king moved east to Shou Chun, named it Ying.

cells.content: 七。彗星見北方西方。夏太后薨。蒙驁死。
cells.translation: Seventh year: Comet appeared in the northern and western regions. Xia Tai Hou died. Meng Ao died.
Third year. Qin attacked us at Ji.
Eighth year: Lao Ai was enfeoffed as Chang Xin Hou.

cells.content: 九。彗星見，竟天。嫪毐為亂，遷其舍人于蜀。彗星復見。
cells.translation: 9th year. comet appeared, spanning heaven. Lao Ai caused rebellion, exiled his retainers to Shu. Comet appeared again.
5th year. Qin captured our Yuan, Puyang, Yan.
King An of Han, first year
Twenty-fifth year: Li Yuan killed Chun Shen Jun.

cells.content: 十。相國呂不韋免。齊、趙來，置酒。太后入咸陽。大索。
cells.translation: 10th year. Prime Minister Lü Buwei was dismissed. Qi and Zhao came, a banquet was held. The Empress Dowager entered Xianyang. A great search was conducted.
King You Dao of Chu, first year

cells.content: 十一。呂不韋之河南。王翦擊鄴、閼與，取九城。
cells.translation: Eleventh year: Lü Bu Wei went to He Nan. Wang Jian attacked Ye and Yan Yu, took nine cities.

cells.content: 九。秦拔我閼與、鄴，取九城。
cells.translation: 9th year. Qin captured our Yan, Ye, took nine cities.

cells.content: 十二。發四郡兵助魏擊楚。呂不韋卒。復嫪毐舍人遷蜀者。
cells.translation: 12th year. sent Si commandery troops to help Wei attack Chu. Lu Wei did not pass away. Again Lao Ai retainers exiled to Shu.
8th year. Qin helped us attack Chu.
3rd year. 3rd year. Qin and Wei attacked us.

cells.content: 十三。桓齮擊平陽，殺趙扈輒，斬首十萬，因東擊。趙王之河南。彗星見。
cells.translation: Thirteenth year: Huan Yin attacked Ping Yang, killed Zhao Hu Zhe, beheaded 100,000, then attacked east. The Zhao king went to He Nan. Comet appeared.

cells.content: 二。秦拔我平陽，敗扈輒，。斬首十萬。
cells.translation: 2nd year. 2nd year. Qin captured our Pingyang, defeated Hu Zhe, beheaded one hundred thousand.

cells.content: 十四。桓齮定平陽、武城、宜安。韓使非來，我殺非。韓王請為臣。
cells.translation: Fourteenth year: Huan Yin pacified Ping Yang, Wu Cheng, and Yi An. Han sent Fei, we killed Fei. The Han king requested to become a vassal.
3rd year. 3rd year. Qin captured our Yian.

cells.content: 十五。興軍至鄴。軍至太原。取狼孟。
cells.translation: 15th year. raised army to Ye. Army reached Taiyuan. Took Langmeng.

cells.content: 四。秦拔我狼孟、鄱吾，。軍鄴。
cells.translation: 4th year. Qin captured our Langmeng and Powu. Army at Ye.

cells.content: 二十三。太子丹質於秦，亡來歸。
cells.translation: Twenty-third year: Crown Prince Dan, who was hostage in Qin, fled and returned.

cells.content: 十六。置麗邑。發卒受韓南陽。
cells.translation: 16th year. established Liyi. Fa passed away. Received Han Nanyang.
8th year. Qin came to receive territory.

cells.content: 十七。內史騰擊得韓王安，盡取其地，置潁川郡。華陽太后薨。
cells.translation: Seventeenth year: Nei Shi Teng attacked and got Han Wang An, took all their territory, established Ying Chuan commandery. Hua Yang Tai Hou died.
Ninth year: Qin captured Wang An; Qin extinguished Han.
Fourteenth year: Wei Jun Jiao, first year.

cells.content: 十九。王翦拔趙，虜王遷邯鄲。帝太后薨。
cells.translation: Nineteenth year: Wang Jian captured Zhao and took Wang Qian prisoner at Han Dan. Di Tai Hou died.

cells.content: 八。秦王翦虜王遷邯鄲。公子嘉自立為代王。
cells.translation: Eighth year: Qin Wang Jian took Wang Qian prisoner at Han Dan. Gongzi Jia established himself as Dai Wang.

cells.content: 十。幽王卒，弟郝立，為哀王。三月，負芻殺哀王。
cells.translation: Tenth year: You Wang died; younger brother Hao established himself as Ai Wang. In the third month, Fu Chu killed Ai Wang.

cells.content: 二十。燕太子使荊軻刺王，覺之。王翦將擊燕。
cells.translation: Twentieth year: Yan crown prince sent Jing Ke to assassinate the king, but it was discovered. Wang Jian would attack Yan.
King Jia of Wei, first year
King Jia of Dai, first year

cells.content: 楚王負芻元年。負芻，哀王庶兄。
cells.translation: Chu Wang Fu Chu, first year. Fu Chu was Ai Wang's half-brother.

cells.content: 二十八。太子丹使荊軻刺秦王，秦伐我。
cells.translation: Twenty-eighth year: Crown Prince Dan sent Jing Ke to assassinate the Qin king; Qin attacked us.
Twenty-first year: Wang Ben attacked Chu.
2nd year. 2nd year. Qin greatly defeated us, took ten cities.

cells.content: 二十九。秦拔我薊，得太子丹。王徙遼東。
cells.translation: Twenty-ninth year: Qin captured our Ji and got Crown Prince Dan. The king moved to Liao Dong.

cells.content: 二十二。王賁擊魏，得其王假，盡取其地。
cells.translation: Twenty-second year: Wang Ben attacked Wei, got their Wang Jia, took all their territory.
Third year: Qin captured Wang Jia.

cells.content: 二十三。王翦、蒙武擊破楚軍，殺其將項燕。
cells.translation: Twenty-third year: Wang Jian and Meng Wu defeated the Chu army, killed their general Xiang Yan.
Fourth year: Qin defeated our general Xiang Yan.

cells.content: 二十四。王翦、蒙武破楚，虜其王負芻。
cells.translation: Twenty-fourth year: Wang Jian and Meng Wu defeated Chu and captured their Wang Fu Chu.
Fifth year: Qin captured Wang Fu Chu. Qin extinguished Chu.

cells.content: 二十五。王賁擊燕，虜王喜。又擊得代王嘉。五月，天下大酺。
cells.translation: Twenty-fifth year: Wang Ben attacked Yan and captured Wang Xi. Also attacked and got Dai Wang Jia. In the fifth month, great feast throughout the realm.

cells.content: 六。秦將王賁虜王嘉，秦滅趙。
cells.translation: Sixth year: Qin general Wang Ben captured Wang Jia; Qin extinguished Zhao.

cells.content: 三十三。秦虜王喜，拔遼東，秦滅燕。
cells.translation: Thirty-third year: Qin captured Wang Xi, captured Liao Dong; Qin extinguished Yan.

cells.content: 二十六。王賁擊齊，虜王建。初并天下，立為皇帝。
cells.translation: Twenty-sixth year: Wang Ben attacked Qi and captured Wang Jian. First unified the realm, established himself as emperor.

cells.content: 四十四。秦虜王建。秦滅齊。
cells.translation: Forty-fourth year: Qin captured Wang Jian. Qin extinguished Qi.

cells.content: 二十七更命河為「德水」。為金人十二。命民曰「黔首」。同天下書。分為三十六郡。
cells.translation: Twenty-seventh year renamed Yellow River "Virtue Water". Made twelve golden men. Called people "Black Heads". Unified writing under heaven. Divided into thirty-six commanderies.

cells.content: 二十八為阿房宮。之衡山。治馳道。帝之琅邪，道南郡入。為太極廟。賜戶三十，爵一級。
cells.translation: Twenty-eighth year at Epang Palace. Went to Hengshan. Built speedways. Emperor went to Langye, entered via Nanguo commandery. Made Taiji Temple. Granted thirty households, one rank of nobility.

cells.content: 二十九郡縣大索十日。帝之琅邪，道上黨入。
cells.translation: Twenty-ninth year great search of commanderies and counties for ten days. Emperor went to Langye, entered via Shangdang.

cells.content: 三十一更命臘曰「嘉平」。賜黔首里六石米二羊，以嘉平。大索二十日。
cells.translation: Thirty-first year renamed La sacrifice "Jiaping". Granted Black Heads six bushels rice and two sheep per li for Jiaping. Great search twenty days.

cells.content: 三十二帝之碣石，道上郡入。
cells.translation: Thirty-second year Emperor went to Jieshi, entered via Shangjun.

cells.content: 三十三遣諸逋亡及賈人贅婿略取陸梁，為桂林、南海、象郡，以適戍。西北取戎為三十四縣。築長城河上，蒙恬將三十萬。
cells.translation: Thirty-third year: sent all fugitives and merchants' sons-in-law to seize Lu Liang, made Gui Lin, Nan Hai, and Xiang commanderies, to garrison the troops. Northwest took Rong lands for 34 counties. Built the long wall along the Yellow River; Meng Tian commanded 300,000.

cells.content: 三十四適治獄不直者築長城。取南方越地。覆獄故失。
cells.translation: Thirty-fourth year inspected prisons, those not fair built long wall. Took southern Yue territory. Reviewed prison old cases.

cells.content: 三十五為直道，道九原，通甘泉。
cells.translation: Thirty-fifth year made Straight Road, via Jiuquan, connecting to Ganquan.

cells.content: 三十六徙民於北河、榆中，耐徙三處，拜爵一級。石畫下東郡，有文言「地分。」
cells.translation: Thirty-sixth year moved people to Beibe, Yuzhong, those who moved three times received one rank. Stone inscription in Dongjun with words "Land divided."

cells.content: 三十七十月，帝之會稽、琅邪，還至沙丘崩。子胡亥立，為二世皇帝。殺蒙恬。道九原入。復行錢。
cells.translation: Thirty-seventh year tenth month, Emperor went to Kuaiji, Langye, returned to Shaqiu where he collapsed. Son Hu Hai established as Second Emperor. Killed Meng Tian. Via Jiuquan entered. Again circulated money.

cells.content: 二世元年十月戊寅，大赦罪人。十一月，為兔園。十二月，就阿房宮。其九月，郡縣皆反。楚兵至戲，章邯擊卻之。出衛君角為庶人。
cells.translation: Er Shi, first year, tenth month, Wu Yin day: great amnesty for criminals. Eleventh month: made the Rabbit Garden. Twelfth month: moved to the E Pang Palace. In the ninth month, the commanderies and counties all rebelled. Chu troops reached Xi; Zhang Han attacked and repelled them. Removed Wei Jun Jiao to commoner status.

cells.content: 二將軍章邯、長史司馬欣、都尉董翳追楚兵至河。誅丞相斯、去疾，將軍馮劫。
cells.translation: Two generals Zhang Han and Chang Shi Si Ma Xin, Du Wei Dong Yi pursued Chu troops to the Yellow River. Executed Chancellor Li Si, Qu Ji, and General Feng Jie.

cells.content: 三趙高反，二世自殺，高立二世兄子嬰。子嬰立，剌殺高，夷三族。諸侯入秦，嬰降，為項羽所殺。尋誅羽，天下屬漢。
cells.translation: Zhao Gao rebelled; Er Shi committed suicide; Gao established Er Shi's nephew Zi Ying. Zi Ying established himself, assassinated Gao, exterminated his three clans. The feudal lords entered Qin; Zi Ying surrendered, was killed by Xiang Yu. Later executed Yu; the realm belonged to Han.
